item.title: Powershell Operators
item.description: Comparison Operators Operator Comparison -eq equals -ne not equals -gt greater than -ge greater than or equal -lt less than -le less than or equal -like string matches wildcard pattern -notlike string does not match wildcard pattern -match string matches regex pattern -notmatch string does not match regex pattern -replace replaces strings matching a regex pattern -contains collection contains a value -notcontains collection does not contain a value -in value is in a collection -notin value is not in a collection -is both objects are the same type -isnot the objects are not the same type Logical Operators Operator Comparison -and Logical AND.

item.title: [pwsh] Find Last Reboot
item.description: Find the last reboot. 1Get-EventLog -LogName System -ComputerName $Env:COMPUTERNAME | Where-Object { $_.eventid -eq '1074' } | sort -Descending -Property timegenerated | Select-Object -First 1 -Property MachineName, Username, timegenerate

item.title: [pwsh] Remove Leading Null From IP Address
[pwsh] Restore Default Powershell Gallery Repository
item.description: This will restore the default repository 1Register-PSRepository -Default

item.title: Active Directory Port Requirements
item.description: The following table lists the port requirements for establishing DC to DC communication in all versions of Windows Sever beginning with Windows Server 2003. Type Port Protocol LDAP 389 TCP/UDP LDAP SSL 636 TCP LDAP GC 3268 TCP LDAP GC SSL 3269 TCP Kerberos 88 TCP/UDP DNS 53 TCP/UDP SMB,CIFS,SMB2, DFSN, LSARPC, NbtSS, NetLogonR, SamR, SrvSvc 445 TCP/UDP SMTP 25 TCP RPC, EPM 135 TCP RPC, DCOM, EPM, DRSUAPI, NetLogonR, SamR, FRS TCP Dynamic RPC, DFSR (SYSVOL) 5722 TCP Windows Time 123 UDP Kerberos change/set password 464 TCP/UDP DFSN, NetLogon, NetBIOS Datagram Service 138 UDP SOAP 9389 TCP DHCP, MADCAP 67, 2535 UDP NetLogon, NetBIOS Name Resolution 137 UDP DFSN, NetBIOS Session Service, NetLogon 139 TCP Referenc: https://docs.

item.title: [pwsh] Monitor the latest changes of a file (tail equivalent)
item.description: 1Get-Content -Path C:\Windows\System32\dhcp\DhcpSrvLog-fri.log -Tail 20 -Wait -tail will display the latest 20 lines of the file and -wait to see updates in real time.

item.title: [pwsh] Get system uptime
item.description: Get system uptime, the elapsed time since last restart. 1[Timespan]::FromMilliseconds([Environment]::TickCount)

item.title: [pwsh] Get RAM
item.description: Get total size of RAM installed. 1[Math]::Round((Get-WmiObject -Class Win32_ComputerSystem).TotalPhysicalMemory/1GB)

item.title: [pwsh] Difference Between Break and Continue
item.description: The difference between break and continue. break exit a loop or switch statement. continue continue but skips the current iteration. 1switch (2,4,5) 2{ 3 1 {"One"} 4 2 {"Two"; continue} 5 3 {"Three"} 6 4 {"Four"; break} 7 5 {"Five"} 8} Output 1Two 2Four

item.title: DHCP Server Event IDs
item.description: Event ID Description 00 The log was started. 01 The log was stopped. 02 The log was temporarily paused due to low disk space. 10 A new IP address was leased to a client. 11 A lease was renewed by a client. 12 A lease was released by a client. 13 An IP address was found in use on the network.

item.title: [pwsh] Convert String to DateTime
item.description: Convert a string to a date-time object. 1[Datetime]::ParseExact('02/04/1984', 'MM/dd/yyyy', $null)

item.title: User Account Control
item.description: PROPERTYFLAG HEXADECIMAL DECIMAL SCRIPT 0x0001 1 ACCOUNTDISABLE 0x0002 2 HOMEDIR_REQUIRED 0x0008 8 LOCKOUT 0x0010 16 PASSWD_NOTREQD 0x0020 32 PASSWD_CANT_CHANGE 0x0040 64 ENCRYPTED_TEXT_PWD_ALLOWED 0x0080 128 TEMP_DUPLICATE_ACCOUNT 0x0100 256 NORMAL_ACCOUNT 0x0200 512 INTERDOMAIN_TRUST_ACCOUNT 0x0800 2048 WORKSTATION_TRUST_ACCOUNT 0x1000 4096 SERVER_TRUST_ACCOUNT 0x2000 8192 DONT_EXPIRE_PASSWORD 0x10000 65536 MNS_LOGON_ACCOUNT 0x20000 131072 SMARTCARD_REQUIRED 0x40000 262144 TRUSTED_FOR_DELEGATION 0x80000 524288 NOT_DELEGATED 0x100000 1048576 USE_DES_KEY_ONLY 0x200000 2097152 DONT_REQ_PREAUTH 0x400000 4194304 PASSWORD_EXPIRED 0x800000 8388608 TRUSTED_TO_AUTH_FOR_DELEGATION 0x1000000 16777216 PARTIAL_SECRETS_ACCOUNT 0x04000000 67108864
